Generation IX.Scarlet: It lies on warm rocks and uses the heat absorbed by its square-shaped scales to create fire energy.
Generation IX.Violet: Its flame sac is small, so energy is always leaking out. This energy is released from the dent atop Fuecoco's head and flickers to and fro.

Generation IX.Scarlet: First partner Pokémon from Clavell in Cabo Poco
Generation IX.Violet: First partner Pokémon from Clavell in Cabo Poco
